question: World Sports Journalists Day is observed on _____________.
explanation: World Sports Journalists Day is celebrated on July 2, to mark the services of sports journalists for the promotion of sports. It was established by the International Sports Press Association (AIPS) in 1994 to mark the 70th anniversary of its foundation. The term "sports journalism" refers to a form of writing that reports on sporting topics, it is an essential element of any news media organization.
